l2-termination-point-attributes.interfac.Description: RFC8944 interface-name: Name of the interface

l2-termination-point-attributes.mac-addr.Description: RFC8944 interface-name: Interface MAC address for LLC

l2-termination-point-attributes.port-num.Description: RFC8944 port-number list: List of port numbers

l2-termination-point-attributes.unnumber.Description: RFC8944 unnumbered-id list: List of unnumbered interface identifiers

l2-termination-point-attributes.encapsul.Description: RFC8944 encapsulation-type: Encapsulation type of this termination point

l2-termination-point-attributes.lag.Description: RFC8944 lag: Is lag supported ir not

l2-termination-point-attributes.member-l.Description: RFC8944 member-link-tp: Relevant only if LAG is supported, list of member link tps
